name: Additional Development,附加开发
description: Additional development headers and libraries for building open-source applications.,用于构建开源应用程序的附加开发标头及程序可。

name: Base,基本
description: The standard installation of OpenCloudOS.,

name: base-x,base-x
description: Local X.org display server,Local X.org 显示服务器

name: C Development Tools and Libraries,C 语言开发工具和库
description: These tools include core development tools such as make.,这些工具包括了核心开发工具，如 make。

name: Container Management,容器管理
description: Tools for managing Linux containers.,用于管理 Linux 容器的工具。

name: Core,核心
description: Smallest possible installation,最小安装

name: Debugging Tools,调试工具
description: Tools for debugging misbehaving applications and diagnosing performance problems.,调试行为异常程序以及诊断性能问题的工具。

name: Development Tools,开发工具
description: A basic development environment.,基本开发环境。

name: DNS Name Server,DNS 名称服务器
description: This package group allows you to run a DNS name server (BIND) on the system.,该软件包组允许您在系统上运行 DNS 名称服务器(BIND)。

name: Fonts,字体
description: Fonts packages for rendering text on the desktop.,用于在桌面显示文字的字体软件包。

name: FTP Server,FTP 服务器
description: These tools allow you to run an FTP server on the system.,这些工具允许您在系统上运行 FTP 服务器。

name: GNOME,GNOME
description: GNOME is a highly intuitive and user-friendly desktop environment.,GNOME 是一个非常直观且用户友好的桌面环境。

name: Hardware Monitoring Utilities,硬件监控工具
description: A set of tools to monitor server hardware.,一组用来监控服务器硬件的工具。

name: Infiniband Support,Infiniband 支持
description: Software designed for supporting clustering, grid connectivity, and low-latency, high bandwidth storage using RDMA-based InfiniBand, iWARP, RoCE, and OPA fabrics.,用来支持使用基于 RDMA 的 InfiniBand、iWARP、RoCE 和 OPA fabrics 实现集群、网格连接以及低延迟高带宽存储的软件。

name: Mail Server,邮件服务器
description: These packages allow you to configure an IMAP or SMTP mail server.,这些软件包允许您配置 IMAP 或 Postfix 邮件服务器。

name: MariaDB (MySQL) Database,MariaDB (MySQL) 数据库
description: This package group contains packages useful for use with MariaDB (MySQL).,该包组包含供 MariaDB (MySQL) 使用的相关软件包。

name: Network File System Client,网络文件系统客户端
description: Enables the system to attach to network storage.,启用该系统附加到网络存储。

name: Network Servers,网络服务器
description: These packages include network-based servers such as DHCP, Kerberos and NIS.,这些软件包包括基于网络的服务器，例如 DHCP、Kerberos 和 NIS。

name: Networking Tools,联网工具
description: Tools for configuring and analyzing computer networks.,配置和分析计算机网络的工具。

name: Performance Tools,性能工具
description: Tools for diagnosing system and application-level performance problems.,诊断系统和程序级别性能问题的工具。

name: Platform Development,平台开发
description: Recommended development headers and libraries for developing applications to run on OpenCloudOS.,

name: Remote Desktop Clients,远程桌面客户端
description: Clients for connecting to remote desktop services,用于连接远程桌面服务的客户端。

name: Scientific Support,科学记数法支持
description: Tools for mathematical and scientific computations, and parallel computing.,用于数学和科学计算以及平行计算的工具。

name: Security Tools,安全性工具
description: Security tools for integrity and trust verification.,用于完整性和可信验证的安全性工具。

name: PostgreSQL Database,PostgreSQL 数据库
description: This package group includes packages useful for use with PostgreSQL.,该软件包组包括有助于使用 Postgresql 的软件包。

name: Standard,标准
description: Common set of utilities that extend the minimal installation.,扩展了最小化安装的常见实用工具集。

name: System Tools,系统工具
description: This group is a collection of various tools for the system, such as the client for connecting to SMB shares and tools to monitor network traffic.,这组软件包是各类系统工具的集合，如：连接 SMB 共享的客户；监控网络交通的工具。

name: Virtualization Client,虚拟化客户端
description: Clients for installing and managing virtualization instances.,用于安装和管理虚拟化事件的客户端。

name: Virtualization Hypervisor,虚拟化 Hypervisor
description: Smallest possible virtualization host installation.,最小的虚拟化主机安装。

name: Virtualization Platform,虚拟化平台
description: Provides an interface for accessing and controlling virtualized guests.,提供用来访问和控制虚拟机的接口。

name: Virtualization Tools,虚拟化工具
description: Tools for offline virtual image management.,用于离线虚拟映像管理的工具。

name: Basic Web Server,基本网页服务器
description: These tools allow you to run a Web server on the system.,这些工具允许您在系统上运行万维网服务器。

name: Workstation product core,工作站产品核心
description: Packages mandatory for the workstation product.,工作站产品必需的软件包。

name: Dial-up Networking Support,拨号网络支持
File and Storage Server,文件及存储服务器
description: CIFS, SMB, NFS, iSCSI, iSER, and iSNS network storage server.,CIFS, SMB, NFS, iSCSI, iSER 及 iSNS 网络存储服务器。

name: Graphical Administration Tools,图形管理工具
description: Graphical system administration tools for managing many aspects of a system.,用于管理系统各个方面的图形系统管理工具。

name: Hardware Support,硬件支持
description: This group is a collection of tools for various hardware specific utilities.,这个组包括了一系列与特定硬件相关的工具程序。

name: Large Systems Performance,大系统性能
description: Performance support tools for large systems.,用于大型系统的性能支持工具。

name: Server product core,服务器产品核心
description: Packages mandatory for the server product.,服务器产品必需的软件包。

name: Smart Card Support,智能卡支持
description: Support for using smart card authentication.,支持使用智能卡验证。

name: Windows File Server,Windows 文件服务器
description: This package group allows you to share files between Linux and MS Windows(tm) systems.,该软件包组允许您在 Linux 和 MS Windows(tm) 系统间共享文件。
